ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] Re: New Member
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve kinda cheated and got one of my girlfriends from another RPG involved in this one, so I ve pretty much always grouped with other women. =)  In fact, I
ygData.messageBody:
I've kinda cheated and got one of my girlfriends from another RPG involved
in this one, so I've pretty much always grouped with other women. =) In
fact, I know three that I play with semi-regularly. I got into RPG's
because the guys at work wanted me to play with them since I admitted I
missed AD&D groups. So now they've gone on to other things and I am hooked.
<grin>

I play a ranger, so I can't help you, Piqa, but there are some really great
websites out there that can. I watch EQForge, personally, but maybe one of
our sisters here could recommend a site for paladins?

Welcome, Piqa, and well met, Tekire and Karranza!

Aelwesara Cuthalion, Povar server
